title: Should The Lakers Shut It Down?
description:
Israel Gutierrez, Clinton Yates and Joon Lee debate if it is time for the Lakers to wave the white flag and shut down LeBron & AD for the rest of the season and if Giannis convinced them last night that he should be the MVP.
